title: Rare disease resources
description: Schema to describe a resource that can be discovered on the EJPRD VP

@id.description: a primary identifier for the resources

@type.description: the primary type for this resource

landingPage.description: The primary URL for the homepage of the resource

theme.description: a name or short description for the resource

description.example: Orphanet is a unique resource, gathering and improving knowledge on rare diseases

language.description: This refers to the natural language used for textual metadata (i.e. titles, descriptions, etc) of a resource (i.e. dataset)

publisher.description: This refers to the organisation that is responsible for the publishing of a resource (i.e. dataset)

title.description: A name given to the cataloged resource.

keyword.description: This refers to the keyword or tag describing the resource.

location.description: Information about the location associated with the organisation
